name: amati generalissimi
description:
Contemplating alternative worlds. What if?..


A recording of a 1987 radio broadcast of the State Radio of Northern Italy—one of the three official radio stations of the Communist Republic of Italy (CRI, or RCI in Italian). The host is talking about a visit of the Beloved Generalissimo, the Supreme Chieftain of all Italians Massimo Colombo to the Torino State Furniture Factory. The workers welcomed the great Colombo in ecstasy.

Generalissimo Massimo Colombo ruled Northern Italy from 1945 to 1990, his main title could be used only in the plural—the Beloved Generalissimos. 

The footage is a VHS rip showing a fragment from the weekly magazine Problemi del socialismo (Problems of socialism). In the fragment, we can see the CRI radio news host celebrity Paula Lombardo posing next to the coat of arms of Northern Italy.

AI-generated elements:
 
- the face of Paula Lombardo
- radio host voices

Human-generated elements:

- the coat of arms of CRI
- radio news jingle

Sound processed with Tascam 424 tape portastudio.
Video processed with camcorder high-end plugins.
